name: SAND CREEK MASSACRE DESCENDANTS TRUST
description: The Trust works to fulfill the promises and reparations of the Treaty of Little Arkansas.
sampleDescriptions: Authorization of descendants of the Sand Creek Massacre to pursue their Treaty claims against the United States, and accounting of reparations related to the Massacre.
